snippet.title: The Beggar's Ride (by Bad Seed) - Universal - HD Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
The Beggar's Ride by Bad Seed (iOS / Android)

"..a wonderfully slick production.." Pocket Gamer

"..charm and heart in spades. And a narrative that will push you on to see what happens next" Pocket Gamer

One night an old man found a mysterious mask; a key to a world hidden on the other side of the rain. It was destined for a hero, a champion, a saviour, but the old man was just a beggar.

Uncover the secrets held within the mask as you journey through strange and beautiful lands wielding god like powers over the world around you and discover the truth behind who The Beggar really is!

The Beggar’s Ride is a unique and innovative Platform Puzzle Adventure Game where the player can manipulate the environment to solve puzzles in a deep and intriguing story of discovery.

The Beggar’s Ride is a true premium experience on iOS devices. Pay once, no hidden extras or In App Purchases.

Features

• A huge world full of intriguing and fiendish puzzles to solve
• 4 masks to discover each granting god like powers
• Collectables, secret areas and much more!

For the best experience please use:

• iPhone 5 and up
• iPad Mini 2 and up
• iPad 4 and up

iTunes Store Page:

https://itunes.apple.com/app/the-beggars-ride/id1045919880?mt=8
